activities: Members store limited personal information and data with our service for the purposes of applying to schools, grants, fellowships, and job opportunities
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer name, address, and education data, all of which is entered by the customers themselves
recoursemech: If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by Interfolio, please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR web site at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
